Definition at line 881 of file lustre_net.h.

struct list_head ptlrpc_srv_req::sr_timed_list [read]

Server side list of incoming unserved requests sorted by arrival time.

Traversed from time to time to notice about to expire requests and sent back "early replies" to clients to let them know server is alive and well, just very busy to service their requests in time
